short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for Jasper Colin Research Pvt. Ltd. operations department

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Store snapshots of the survey directly from Google Chrome

JCR Ops Tool extension is a private extension and is built only to be used internally by the company and its employees. It can only be enabled when a specific URL address of the survey is opened. The extension creates a collaborated image/pdf of the attempted survey.

NOTE – This extension is only compatible with Google Chrome and is intended for company's (Jasper Colin Research Pvt. Ltd.) internal use.



Features
-------------

Retrieves the RA comments from JCR database if the questions of the survey are similar to the ones in the JCR database
Detects and Translates the survey to English if the survey is in a foreign language
Consolidated image/pdf of the attempted survey can be downloaded by JCR employees


How to Use
----------------

• A private link will be sent to user to download the extension
• Once downloaded, the extension will work on the survey tab only
• Attempt the survey, and click on “Take Screenshot” to get the screenshot of the attempted survey
• Click on Get Comments to retrieve the RA comment

NOTE – This extension is not for personal use.
